code: import{CHANGE_LAYOUT,CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,TOGGLE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR}from'./constants';export var changeLayout=function changeLayout(layout){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT,payload:layout};};export var changeLayoutWidth=function changeLayoutWidth(width){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,payload:width};};export var changeSidebarTheme=function changeSidebarTheme(theme){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,payload:theme};};export var changeSidebarType=function changeSidebarType(sidebarType){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,payload:sidebarType};};export var toggleRightSidebar=function toggleRightSidebar(){return{type:TOGGLE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};export var showRightSidebar=function showRightSidebar(){return{type:SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};export var hideRightSidebar=function hideRightSidebar(){return{type:HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};
